content: **…let me shout out a big thank you for your love your ongoing support your understanding your patience… for being by my side through this difficult year … hope you enjoy this hat pattern ** for pattern support please go to the help thread here 1 *jelka* is a casual hat worked in the round from the folded brim to the top the cute pattern on this hat is knitted with only one color on any given round working slip stitches you get a beautiful colorwork without having to carry two threads in one round making it the perfect introduction to colorwork an optional pompom is worked last yarn worsted weight yarn approximately mc 148 161 174 yds /135 147 159 m cc 14 18 22 yds /13 16 20 m *note yardage doesn t include optional pompom * rosa pomar brusca 136 yds 125 m /50g shown in color b mc and 6b cc needles us 5 3 75 mm circular needle 16 40 cm long for brim us 6 4 mm circular needle 16 40 cm long and dpns for body **needle sizes are suggestions only please make a gauge swatch to determine the needle size needed to get gauge** gauge 20 sts x 30 row = 4 10 cm square in stockinette stitch on larger needle after blocking sizes circumference unstretched 18 19 5 21 / 46 49 5 53 5 cm to fit 20/21 5 21 5/23 23/24 5 51/54 5 54 5/58 5 58 5/62 cm notions smooth waste yarn and crochet hook for provisional cast on 8 stitch markers tapestry needle pompom maker optional blocking tools 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/designs-by-isabell-kraemer/topics/4171478
